name: BillPickering'sWisdom
0:
”Alexa, ask Bill Pickering's Wisdom for wisdom.”
”Alexa, ask Bill Pickering's Wisdom for his opinion.”
”Alexa, ask Bill Pickering's Wisdom for a saying.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bill pickering's wisdom
des: This skill offers any user the ability to ask Bill Pickering what he thinks. The Bill Pickering skill will provide funny sayings about life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
